title: Talk about React-redux
discription: React-redux is a library that helps us to manage the state of the application. It is a predictable state container for JavaScript applications. It helps us to write applications that behave consistently, run in different environments (client, server, and native), and are easy to test. It provides a great experience when using React with Redux. It helps us to write clean and maintainable code in any JavaScript application.
author: Saurabh

title: talk about javascript es6
discription: javascript es6  is a programming language that conforms to the ECMAScript specification. JavaScript is high-level, often just-in-time compiled, and multi-paradigm. It has curly-bracket syntax, dynamic typing, prototype-based object-orientation, and first-class functions.
author: rakib
